# Lucky Streak (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Complete Scoundrel (WotC), pg. 100

*A tinkling laugh and a momentary shine surround your ally, leaving him with an aura of confidence and a sly smile.*

You improve the luck of the subject creature. For the duration of the spell, any reroll the subject makes using a luck feat gains a +2 luck bonus.
